bibl.title: Postcard from J.W. Corbett to Philip Showalter Hench, December 30, 1941

div1.p: Corbett compliments Hench on his speech during the unveiling of the Cornwell painting.

div1.head: Postcard from J.W. Corbett to Philip Showalter Hench, December 30, 1941
div1.opener:
GENUINE CURTEICH · CHICAGO “C.T. PHOTO-COLORITY” POST CARD (REGR S PAT. OFF.)
UNITED
STATES
POSTAGE
1 CENT 1
POST CARD
Dr. P. S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester,
Minn-
Ac
Ms
div1.p:
Thanks for your
splendid address
on the painting,
“The Conquerors of
Yellow Fever”:
Enjoyed it-
